title: Define all enums
description: Create `app/models/enums.py` defining all enums: UserRole (ENGINEER, DESIGNER, PM, MARKETER, GROWTH, FOUNDER, OTHER), AvailabilityStatus (OPEN_TO_TRIBE, AVAILABLE_FOR_PROJECTS, JUST_BROWSING), ProjectStatus (SHIPPED, IN_PROGRESS, ARCHIVED), CollaboratorStatus (PENDING, CONFIRMED, DECLINED), TribeStatus (OPEN, ACTIVE, ALUMNI), MemberRole (OWNER, MEMBER), MemberStatus (ACTIVE, PENDING, REJECTED), EventType (PROJECT_CREATED, PROJECT_SHIPPED, COLLABORATION_CONFIRMED, TRIBE_CREATED, MEMBER_JOINED_TRIBE, BUILDER_JOINED), SkillCategory (ENGINEERING, DESIGN, PRODUCT, MARKETING, GROWTH, DATA, OPERATIONS, OTHER). All should inherit from str and Enum.
acceptance_criteria:
- `app/models/enums.py` exports all 8 enum classes
- Each enum has all specified values
- All enums inherit from (str, Enum)
- Values use uppercase snake_case for names, lowercase for values
